title: Judd Apatow
description:
Judd Apatow joins Kevin Hart to discuss his career as a comedian, how he transitioned from the stage to writing some of the most successful comedy movies of all time, and how working with other comedians and actors like Ben Stiller and Jim Carrey helped him find his voice in the comedy space.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Judd Apatow)
